==========================================
  Team Sync - Premiere Pro Extension
  Installation Guide
==========================================

WHAT IS THIS?
  Team Sync lets multiple editors collaborate on 
  the same Premiere Pro project via Google Drive.
  Push/pull project files and media automatically.

HOW TO INSTALL:
  1. Right-click "install.bat" and select 
     "Run as administrator"
  2. The installer will set up everything
  3. Open Adobe Premiere Pro
  4. Go to: Window > Extensions > Team Sync
  5. Click "Connect Google Drive" and sign in

HOW TO UNINSTALL:
  1. Right-click "uninstall.bat" and select
     "Run as administrator"

REQUIREMENTS:
  - Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2018 or later
  - Windows 10/11
  - Google account with Drive access

FEATURES:
  - Push/Pull project files via Google Drive
  - Sync timeline media files
  - Auto-link offline media after download
  - Download progress bar with speed
  - File size display

TROUBLESHOOTING:
  - If the extension doesn't show in Window > Extensions,
    restart Premiere Pro
  - If buttons don't respond, try closing and 
    reopening the extension panel
  - Check Window > Extensions menu - look for 
    "Team Sync"

==========================================
  Built with love for video editors <3
==========================================
